German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

wo +‎ her

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /voˈheːɐ̯/

Adverb[edit]

woher

  1. where from, whence
    Woher kommt ihr? (informal, plural) ― Where do you come from?
  2. how (not the general meaning of "in which way", but meaning "from which source" or "from where" exactly)
    Woher soll ich das wissen? ― How should I know?

Antonyms[edit]

  • wohin

Related terms[edit]

  • daher
  • dorther
  • hierher

Further reading[edit]

  • woher in Duden online

Hunsrik[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈvoːɐ/

Adjective[edit]

woher (comparative wohrer, superlative woherst)

  1. true
  2. genuine
  3. real

Derived terms[edit]

  • Woherheet, Woherheit

Further reading[edit]

  • Online Hunsrik Dictionary
